question_text: What is the difference between fixed-function pipeline and programmable pipeline?
correct_answer: Fixed-function: hardcoded transformation/lighting stages; Programmable: custom shaders (vertex/fragment) for full control.

question_text: What is the difference between vertex shader and fragment shader?
correct_answer: Vertex shader: processes vertices (position

question_text: What is the difference between VAO and VBO?
correct_answer: VAO (Vertex Array Object): stores vertex attribute configurations; VBO (Vertex Buffer Object): stores vertex data.

question_text: What is the difference between glDrawArrays and glDrawElements?
correct_answer: glDrawArrays: draws using sequential vertices; glDrawElements: draws using indices from element array buffer.

question_text: What is the difference between GL_TRIANGLES and GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP?
correct_answer: GL_TRIANGLES: separate triangles (3 vertices each); GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP: connected triangles sharing vertices (more efficient).

question_text: What is the difference between uniform and attribute variables?
correct_answer: Attribute: per-vertex data (position
explanation: normal); Uniform: constant across draw call (transform matrices

question_text: What is the difference between texture filtering: GL_NEAREST and GL_LINEAR?
correct_answer: GL_NEAREST: nearest pixel (blocky); GL_LINEAR: bilinear interpolation (smoother).

question_text: What is the difference between mipmapping and anisotropic filtering?
correct_answer: Mipmapping: pre-scaled texture levels; Anisotropic filtering: improves angled texture quality beyond mipmapping.

question_text: What is the difference between framebuffer and renderbuffer?
correct_answer: Framebuffer: collection of buffers (color
topic: stencil); Renderbuffer: single buffer optimized for off-screen rendering.

question_text: What is the difference between glClear and glClearColor?
correct_answer: glClearColor: sets clear color value; glClear: actually clears buffers with set values.

question_text: What is the difference between GL_DEPTH_TEST and GL_BLEND?
correct_answer: GL_DEPTH_TEST: depth buffer testing; GL_BLEND: color blending (transparency).

question_text: What is the difference between glGenTextures and glBindTexture?
correct_answer: glGenTextures: generates texture names; glBindTexture: activates texture unit for operations.

question_text: What is the difference between glTexImage2D and glTexSubImage2D?
correct_answer: glTexImage2D: allocates and uploads full texture; glTexSubImage2D: updates portion of existing texture.

question_text: What is the difference between perspective and orthographic projection?
correct_answer: Perspective: realistic depth (foreshortening); Orthographic: parallel projection (no perspective

question_text: What is the difference between model
correct_answer: Spaces
topic: Model: object to world space; View: world to camera space; Projection: camera to clip space.

question_text: What is the difference between glEnable and glDisable?
correct_answer: glEnable: activates OpenGL capability; glDisable: deactivates capability.

question_text: What is the difference between immediate mode and retained mode?
correct_answer: Immediate mode: glBegin/glEnd (deprecated); Retained mode: buffers/shaders (modern).

question_text: What is the difference between glBufferData and glBufferSubData?
correct_answer: glBufferData: allocates/initializes buffer; glBufferSubData: updates portion of existing buffer.

question_text: What is the difference between GL_STATIC_DRAW and GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW?
correct_answer: GL_STATIC_DRAW: data won't change; GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW: data may change frequently.

question_text: What is the difference between glGetUniformLocation and glGetAttribLocation?
correct_answer: glGetUniformLocation: gets uniform variable location; glGetAttribLocation: gets attribute variable location.

question_text: What is the difference between texture wrapping modes: GL_REPEAT and GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE?
correct_answer: GL_REPEAT: tiles texture; GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE: extends edge colors.

question_text: What is the difference between glViewport and glScissor?
correct_answer: glViewport: sets rendering area; glScissor: restricts rendering to rectangle (discards outside).

question_text: What is the difference between blending equations: GL_FUNC_ADD and GL_FUNC_SUBTRACT?
correct_answer: GL_FUNC_ADD: source + destination; GL_FUNC_SUBTRACT: source - destination.

question_text: What is the difference between glPolygonMode's GL_FILL and GL_LINE?
correct_answer: GL_FILL: filled polygons; GL_LINE: wireframe polygons.

question_text: What is the difference between glClearDepth and glDepthFunc?
correct_answer: glClearDepth: sets depth clear value; glDepthFunc: sets depth comparison function.

question_text: What is the difference between glStencilFunc and glStencilOp?
correct_answer: glStencilFunc: sets stencil test function; glStencilOp: sets actions for stencil pass/fail.

question_text: What is the difference between glActiveTexture and glBindTexture?
correct_answer: glActiveTexture: selects texture unit; glBindTexture: binds texture to active unit.

question_text: What is the difference between glGenBuffers and glBindBuffer?
correct_answer: glGenBuffers: generates buffer names; glBindBuffer: activates buffer for operations.

question_text: What is the difference between glVertexAttribPointer and glEnableVertexAttribArray?
correct_answer: glVertexAttribPointer: describes attribute data format; glEnableVertexAttribArray: enables attribute array.

question_text: What is the difference between GL_RGB and GL_RGBA texture formats?
correct_answer: GL_RGB: 3 channels (red
topic: blue); GL_RGBA: 4 channels (adds alpha for transparency).

question_text: What is the difference between glCullFace and glFrontFace?
correct_answer: glCullFace: sets which face to cull (GL_FRONT/BACK); glFrontFace: defines front face winding (GL_CW/CCW).

question_text: What is the difference between glTexParameteri and glTexParameterf?
correct_answer: glTexParameteri: integer parameters; glTexParameterf: float parameters.

question_text: What is the difference between glGetError and glDebugMessageCallback?
correct_answer: glGetError: synchronous error checking; glDebugMessageCallback: asynchronous debug message callback.

question_text: What is the difference between GLSL versions: 330
correct_answer: Versions
topic: 330: OpenGL 3.3; 400: OpenGL 4.0; 450: OpenGL 4.5; each adds new features and syntax.

question_text: What is the difference between geometry shader and tessellation shader?
correct_answer: Geometry shader: creates/modifies primitives; Tessellation shader: subdivides patches for smooth surfaces.

question_text: What is the difference between instanced rendering and multi-draw?
correct_answer: Instanced rendering: draws multiple instances with per-instance data; Multi-draw: draws multiple primitives with single call.

question_text: What is the difference between transform feedback and shader storage buffer objects?
correct_answer: Transform feedback: captures vertex shader output; SSBO: general read/write buffer for shaders.

question_text: What is the difference between uniform buffer objects and shader storage buffer objects?
correct_answer: UBO: read-only

question_text: What is the difference between glBlendFunc and glBlendFuncSeparate?
correct_answer: glBlendFunc: same function for RGB and alpha; glBlendFuncSeparate: separate functions for RGB and alpha.

question_text: What is the difference between depth buffer and stencil buffer?
correct_answer: Depth buffer: stores depth values for occlusion; Stencil buffer: masks areas for special effects.

question_text: What is the difference between glReadPixels and glCopyTexImage2D?
correct_answer: glReadPixels: reads pixels to CPU memory; glCopyTexImage2D: copies framebuffer to texture directly.

question_text: What is the difference between GL_LINEAR and GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR?
correct_answer: GL_LINEAR: bilinear filtering; GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR: trilinear filtering (mipmap levels).

question_text: What is the difference between glGenFramebuffers and glBindFramebuffer?
correct_answer: glGenFramebuffers: generates framebuffer names; glBindFramebuffer: activates framebuffer for operations.

question_text: What is the difference between glFramebufferTexture2D and glFramebufferRenderbuffer?
correct_answer: glFramebufferTexture2D: attaches texture; glFramebufferRenderbuffer: attaches renderbuffer.

question_text: What is the difference between GL_RGBA8 and GL_RGBA32F texture internal formats?
correct_answer: GL_RGBA8: 8-bit per channel (normalized); GL_RGBA32F: 32-bit float per channel (HDR

question_text: What is the difference between glMapBuffer and glBufferSubData?
correct_answer: glMapBuffer: maps buffer to CPU memory pointer; glBufferSubData: copies data to buffer.

question_text: What is the difference between GL_POINTS and GL_LINES?
correct_answer: GL_POINTS: individual points; GL_LINES: pairs of vertices as line segments.

question_text: What is the difference between glDepthRange and glDepthFunc?
correct_answer: glDepthRange: sets depth buffer range mapping; glDepthFunc: sets depth comparison function.

question_text: What is the difference between glColorMask and glStencilMask?
correct_answer: glColorMask: enables/disables color buffer writing; glStencilMask: controls stencil buffer writing.

question_text: What is the difference between glHint and direct control?
correct_answer: glHint: suggests quality/performance tradeoffs; direct control: explicit settings.

question_text: What is the difference between GL_ALWAYS and GL_NEVER depth/stencil functions?
correct_answer: GL_ALWAYS: always passes; GL_NEVER: always fails.

question_text: What is the difference between glMultiDrawArrays and glDrawArraysInstanced?
correct_answer: glMultiDrawArrays: multiple draws with different parameters; glDrawArraysInstanced: single draw with instance count.

question_text: What is the difference between glGetIntegerv and glGetFloatv?
correct_answer: glGetIntegerv: gets integer state values; glGetFloatv: gets float state values.

question_text: What is the difference between glTexStorage2D and glTexImage2D?
correct_answer: glTexStorage2D: immutable storage allocation; glTexImage2D: mutable storage allocation.

question_text: What is the difference between glGenerateMipmap and manually created mipmaps?
correct_answer: glGenerateMipmap: automatically generates from base level; manual: artist-created levels for quality control.

question_text: What is the difference between glIsEnabled and glGetBooleanv?
correct_answer: glIsEnabled: checks if capability is enabled; glGetBooleanv: gets boolean state value.

question_text: What is the difference between GL_FLOAT and GL_HALF_FLOAT vertex attributes?
correct_answer: GL_FLOAT: 32-bit float; GL_HALF_FLOAT: 16-bit float (less precision

question_text: What is the difference between glBindBufferBase and glBindBufferRange?
correct_answer: glBindBufferBase: binds entire buffer; glBindBufferRange: binds buffer subrange.

question_text: What is the difference between glUniform and glUniformMatrix?
correct_answer: glUniform: sets scalar/vector uniforms; glUniformMatrix: sets matrix uniforms.

question_text: What is the difference between glLineWidth and glPointSize?
correct_answer: glLineWidth: sets line width; glPointSize: sets point size.

question_text: What is the difference between glDepthMask and glColorMask?
correct_answer: glDepthMask: enables/disables depth buffer writing; glColorMask: enables/disables color buffer writing.

question_text: What is the difference between glPolygonOffset and glDepthFunc?
correct_answer: glPolygonOffset: adds depth offset for fighting z-fighting; glDepthFunc: sets depth comparison.

question_text: What is the difference between glClearStencil and glStencilFunc?
correct_answer: glClearStencil: sets stencil clear value; glStencilFunc: sets stencil test function.

question_text: What is the difference between glBlendColor and glBlendFunc?
correct_answer: glBlendColor: sets constant blend color; glBlendFunc: sets blend factors.

question_text: What is the difference between glGetString and glGetStringi?
correct_answer: glGetString: gets single string (e.g.

question_text: What is the difference between glCreateProgram and glCreateShader?
correct_answer: glCreateProgram: creates shader program object; glCreateShader: creates individual shader object.

question_text: What is the difference between glAttachShader and glLinkProgram?
correct_answer: glAttachShader: attaches shader to program; glLinkProgram: links attached shaders into executable.

question_text: What is the difference between glValidateProgram and glLinkProgram?
correct_answer: glLinkProgram: creates executable; glValidateProgram: validates against current OpenGL state.

question_text: What is the difference between glGetProgramiv and glGetShaderiv?
correct_answer: glGetProgramiv: queries program object parameters; glGetShaderiv: queries shader object parameters.

question_text: What is the difference between glGetUniformBlockIndex and glGetUniformLocation?
correct_answer: glGetUniformBlockIndex: gets uniform block index; glGetUniformLocation: gets uniform variable location.

question_text: What is the difference between GL_TEXTURE_2D and GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP?
correct_answer: GL_TEXTURE_2D: regular 2D texture; GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP: cube map (6 faces for environment mapping).

question_text: What is the difference between glTexImage2D and glTexImage3D?
correct_answer: glTexImage2D: 2D texture; glTexImage3D: 3D texture (volume).

question_text: What is the difference between glBindAttribLocation and glGetAttribLocation?
correct_answer: glBindAttribLocation: sets attribute location before linking; glGetAttribLocation: queries location after linking.

question_text: What is the difference between glBindFragDataLocation and glGetFragDataLocation?
correct_answer: glBindFragDataLocation: sets fragment output location; glGetFragDataLocation: queries output location.

question_text: What is the difference between glClipPlane and shader-based clipping?
correct_answer: glClipPlane: fixed-function clipping planes; shader-based: discard fragments in fragment shader.

question_text: What is the difference between glFog and shader-based fog?
correct_answer: glFog: fixed-function fog; shader-based: computed in fragment shader for better control.

question_text: What is the difference between glLight and shader-based lighting?
correct_answer: glLight: fixed-function lighting; shader-based: custom lighting models in shaders.

question_text: What is the difference between glMaterial and shader-based materials?
correct_answer: glMaterial: fixed-function material properties; shader-based: custom material properties.

question_text: What is the difference between immediate mode display lists and VBOs?
correct_answer: Display lists: pre-compiled commands (deprecated); VBOs: buffer objects with vertex data.

question_text: What is the difference between glEvalMesh and shader-based tessellation?
correct_answer: glEvalMesh: fixed-function NURBS tessellation; shader-based: programmable tessellation shaders.

question_text: What is the difference between glAccum and modern post-processing?
correct_answer: glAccum: accumulation buffer for effects (deprecated); modern: framebuffers and shaders.

question_text: What is the difference between glRenderMode and modern selection/picking?
correct_answer: glRenderMode: selection and feedback modes (deprecated); modern: color coding or ray casting.

question_text: What is the difference between glPush/PopMatrix and modern matrix handling?
correct_answer: glPush/PopMatrix: matrix stack operations (deprecated); modern: manual matrix management with libraries.

question_text: What is the difference between GLU and modern helper libraries?
correct_answer: GLU: OpenGL Utility Library (deprecated features); modern: GLM

question_text: What is the difference between wgl
correct_answer: APIs
topic: wgl: Windows; glX: Linux/Unix; CGL: macOS; platform-specific context creation.

question_text: What is the difference between OpenGL and OpenGL ES?
correct_answer: OpenGL: desktop full API; OpenGL ES: embedded subset (mobile

question_text: What is the difference between OpenGL and Vulkan?
correct_answer: OpenGL: high-level

question_text: What is the difference between forward and deferred rendering?
correct_answer: Forward: shades each light per object; Deferred: stores geometry data first
explanation: then shades lights in screen space.

question_text: What is the difference between PBR and traditional lighting models?
correct_answer: PBR: physically-based rendering (energy conservation

question_text: What is the difference between shadow mapping and shadow volumes?
correct_answer: Shadow mapping: depth texture from light view; Shadow volumes: geometry-based stencil shadows.

question_text: What is the difference between normal mapping and parallax mapping?
correct_answer: Normal mapping: fakes surface detail with normals; Parallax mapping: adds depth perception.

question_text: What is the difference between SSAO and HBAO?
correct_answer: SSAO: screen-space ambient occlusion; HBAO: horizon-based ambient occlusion (higher quality).

question_text: What is the difference between FXAA and MSAA?
correct_answer: FXAA: fast approximate anti-aliasing (post-process); MSAA: multi-sample anti-aliasing (hardware).

question_text: What is the difference between V-Sync and adaptive sync?
correct_answer: V-Sync: locks to display refresh rate; Adaptive sync (FreeSync/G-Sync): matches GPU output to display.

question_text: What is the difference between glFlush and glFinish?
correct_answer: glFlush: ensures commands are sent to GPU; glFinish: waits for all commands to complete.

question_text: What is the difference between double buffering and triple buffering?
correct_answer: Double buffering: front and back buffer; Triple buffering: adds extra buffer to reduce stutter.

question_text: What is the difference between glDrawBuffer and glReadBuffer?
correct_answer: glDrawBuffer: sets buffer for drawing; glReadBuffer: sets buffer for reading.

question_text: What is the difference between client-side and server-side memory?
correct_answer: Client-side: CPU memory (arrays); Server-side: GPU memory (buffers/textures).

question_text: What is the difference between synchronous and asynchronous queries?
correct_answer: Synchronous: blocks CPU; Asynchronous: non-blocking

question_text: What is the difference between glBeginQuery and glEndQuery?
correct_answer: glBeginQuery: starts query; glEndQuery: ends query.

question_text: What is the difference between occlusion query and timer query?
correct_answer: Occlusion query: counts passing fragments; Timer query: measures GPU time.

question_text: What is the difference between glGetQueryObjectiv and glGetQueryObjectuiv?
correct_answer: glGetQueryObjectiv: signed integer result; glGetQueryObjectuiv: unsigned integer result.

question_text: What is the difference between glGetProgramInfoLog and glGetShaderInfoLog?
correct_answer: glGetProgramInfoLog: program linking/validation log; glGetShaderInfoLog: shader compilation log.

question_text: What is the difference between glCheckFramebufferStatus and glGetError?
correct_answer: glCheckFramebufferStatus: checks framebuffer completeness; glGetError: checks general OpenGL errors.

question_text: What is the difference between GL_INVALID_OPERATION and GL_INVALID_VALUE?
correct_answer: GL_INVALID_OPERATION: illegal operation for current state; GL_INVALID_VALUE: numeric argument out of range.

question_text: What is the difference between glDebugMessageControl and glDebugMessageCallback?
correct_answer: glDebugMessageControl: filters debug messages; glDebugMessageCallback: sets callback function.

question_text: What is the difference between GL_DEBUG_SEVERITY_HIGH and GL_DEBUG_SEVERITY_LOW?
correct_answer: HIGH: critical errors; LOW: performance warnings

question_text: What is the difference between glObjectLabel and glObjectPtrLabel?
correct_answer: glObjectLabel: labels OpenGL objects; glObjectPtrLabel: labels sync objects.

question_text: What is the difference between glBindImageTexture and glBindTexture?
correct_answer: glBindImageTexture: for image load/store operations; glBindTexture: for regular texture sampling.

question_text: What is the difference between glMemoryBarrier and glFenceSync?
correct_answer: glMemoryBarrier: ensures memory operations complete; glFenceSync: creates synchronization point between CPU/GPU.

question_text: What is the difference between glWaitSync and glClientWaitSync?
correct_answer: glWaitSync: GPU waits on GPU; glClientWaitSync: CPU waits on GPU.

question_text: What is the difference between glPatchParameteri and glPatchParameterfv?
correct_answer: glPatchParameteri: integer patch parameters; glPatchParameterfv: float patch parameters.

question_text: What is the difference between glMinSampleShading and glSampleCoverage?
correct_answer: glMinSampleShading: controls per-sample shading rate; glSampleCoverage: sets sample coverage for alpha testing.

question_text: What is the difference between glProvokingVertex and glPointParameter?
correct_answer: glProvokingVertex: sets which vertex provides flat-shaded values; glPointParameter: sets point sprite parameters.

question_text: What is the difference between glPrimitiveRestartIndex and glEnable(GL_PRIMITIVE_RESTART)?
correct_answer: glPrimitiveRestartIndex: sets restart index value; glEnable: enables primitive restart feature.

question_text: What is the difference between glDrawArraysIndirect and glDrawElementsIndirect?
correct_answer: glDrawArraysIndirect: indirect drawing with arrays; glDrawElementsIndirect: indirect drawing with elements.

question_text: What is the difference between glTexBuffer and glTexBufferRange?
correct_answer: glTexBuffer: binds entire buffer as texture; glTexBufferRange: binds buffer subrange as texture.

question_text: What is the difference between glGetInternalformativ and glGetTexLevelParameter?
correct_answer: glGetInternalformativ: queries internal format support; glGetTexLevelParameter: queries texture level parameters.

question_text: What is the difference between glGetGraphicsResetStatus and regular error checking?
correct_answer: glGetGraphicsResetStatus: checks for GPU reset (context loss); regular error checking: normal OpenGL errors.
